Title: Knowing
Overview: A teacher opens a time capsule that has been dug up at his son's elementary school; in it are some chilling predictions -- some that have already occurred and others that are about to -- that lead him to believe his family plays a role in the events that are about to unfold.
Tagline: What happens when the numbers run out?
Keywords: cataclysm, code, suspense, end of the world, time capsule, astrophysicist, grieving widower, lexington massachusetts, westford massachusetts, prediction, researcher, numbers, news
production_companies: Summit Entertainment, Mystery Clock Cinema, Escape Artists, Goldcrest Pictures, Kaplan/Perrone Entertainment, Wintergreen Productions
Cast: Nicolas Cage, Rose Byrne, Chandler Canterbury
